[i]Fusion Art[/i] – {1}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. If {G} was spent, you may mill a card.
{3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact. Return up to two creature and/or Vehicle cards from your graveyard to your hand.
notes: 2.1.0: Added fusion art green since to replace reclaimer verus. Also making the drain cost a generic should buff it just a smidge for orzhov, and the fusion art helps encourage green to take it for the value.
